Topic.Title: World quest bosses in Argus not giving credit

Posts.EditableText: For some reason the various world quest boss fights don't give credit for the killing the boss even though the boss can be looted. This has happened to me now at least a dozen different times, but watcher Aival was the worse at 6 times killing him. How is it that such a basic game mechanic over several years be bugged like this. Does Blizzard just not care about the game any more and more interested in promoting battle net as a gaming platform ? Please Help ! Thanks ! I didn't find the right solution from the internet. References: - https://us.battle.net/forums/en/wow/topic/20758777572894651 - Social Media Campaign Example
